law.catch_line: KRS 304.17A-660 to 304.17A-669 not to be construed as mandating coverage for mental health conditions -- Exemptions from KRS 304.17A-660 to 304.17A-669.

text.section: Nothing in KRS 304.17A-660 to 304.17A-669 shall be construed as mandating coverage for mental health conditions.

The following shall be exempt from the provisions of KRS 304.17A-660 to 304.17A-669:
A group health benefit plan covering fewer than fifty-one (51) employees;
An individual health benefit plan; and
An employer-organized association as defined in KRS 304.17A-005.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 351, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 463, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000.
